message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm.  $11,500 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. What do you think?
